channel.title: Home on Pylone's R documents site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Pylone's R documents site

item.title: Intitial built idea of this website
item.description: Motivation I have been strongly influencing by Yihui’s blog this two years . Or rather say, specifically, was continuous motivated, simulated by such high quantity and quality output of this person, comparing to the ordinary people like me, who did not have any output or works for entire decade. Deep anxious came to me suddenly when I realized this such huge difference of life quality between the two groups, and the strong desire to complete beautiful masterpiece inside of my mind was also inspired.

item.title: One example of ploting Alluviam
item.description: 1.data input and pre-process 1.1Inputing the original data from local path library(readxl) library(dplyr) data <- read_excel("/Users/profits/Rdata/website/content/plot/2021-06-06-one-example-of-ploting-alluviam/data.xlsx") 1.2checking the data structure head(data) ## # A tibble: 6 x 16 ## sample soil_type location season longitude latitude pH ORP DO T ## <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 127 R west rain 100°13′7… 25°37′5… 8.35 82 2.50 14.4 ## 2 57 R west dry 100°8′48… 25°46′2… 7.

item.title: How to custom your website
item.description: config.toml For this example site, I defined permalinks for two sections, post and note, so that the links to pages under these directories will contain the date info, e.g., https://xmin.yihui.org/post/2016/02/14/a-plain-markdown-post/. This is optional, and it is up to your personal taste of URLs. [permalinks] post = "/post/:year/:month/:day/:slug/" note = "/note/:year/:month/:day/:slug/" You can define the menu through menu.main, e.g., [[menu.main]] name = "Home" url = "/" weight = 1 [[menu.main]] name = "About" url = "/about/" weight = 2 [[menu.

item.title: Output but not Input make sense
item.description: I would like to explain the meaning of life from the view of output. If a person, at the end of his or her life, has no left notes, or has not embodied memorable deeds in the form of a work, I am afraid that the meaning of his or her existence only make sense when considering he or she as a animal as one of the chain of human reproduction.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.
